revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Open-Mesh |model=OM2P |revision=-LC |fcc_date=09/19/2012 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |type=mesh node, access point |fcc_id=WT8OM2PLC |ic_id=10103A-OM2PLC |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=FL128PIFL |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS32M16DS-5T |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=open-mesh |default_ssid_regex=^open-mesh$ |default_user=root |default_pass=0p3nm35h |oui=AC:86:74 |oui_eth=AC:86:74 }} '''OM2P-LC 150Mbps Access Point''' [http://www.open-mesh.com/index.php/products/om2p-lc.html On '''Open-Mesh''''s store] :[https://www.open-mesh.com/skin/frontend/default/open-mesh/images/om2p.pdf Datasheet for the OM2P series] ::Transmit Power is noted to be 20dBm... "7016A0604001 Ver:1.00" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. An Atheros logo is visible on the WiSoC in the FCC internal photos.
The SoC is presumed to be AR9331 based on the specifications of the device. :AR9330 / Hornet based (AR9331 and AR1311 being included in that family) [https://dev.openwrt.org/changeset/32611 Changeset to support the device on the OpenWrt Trac] The PoE implementation in this device consists of a Passive PoE feed with pins +4,5 and -7,8 at 18 VDC.
